Name: Cuba Pintada
Ingredients: 60 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
Instructions: POUR ingredients into ice-filled glass, briefly STIR and serve.
Review: The name of this popular Cuban drink literally means 'stained Cuba' and there is just enough cola in this rum and soda to stain the drink brown.
Nutrition: One serving of Cuba Pintada contains 143 calories
